global.gui

Interface IWindow

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IChoosingWindow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicPanel, ChoosingListWindow, ChoosingListWindowStub, ChoosingListWindowStub, ChoosingWindowStub, IMainframeWindow, IPracticeStationWindow, IVotingStationWindow, MainframeWindow, MainframeWindowStub, MainframeWindowStub, MainframeWindowStub, MainframeWindowStub, PracticeStationWindow, PracticeStationWindowStub, PracticeStationWindowStub, PracticeWindowStub, StationPanel, VotingStationWindow, VotingStationWindowStub, VotingStationWindowStub, VotingStationWindowStub

    public interface IWindow
    Interface for basic required methods from every window
    Author:
    Ziv Ronen

    • Method Detail

      • getConfirmation

        java.lang.Boolean getConfirmation(java.lang.String confirmationMessage)
        Prints on the screen the message with a "yes" and a "no" button, waits for the user to click.
        Parameters:
        confirmationMessage - the message to print
        Returns:
        true if the user clicks on yes, false if he clicks on no

      • printError

        void printError(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Prints the error message with a button "ok" and waits for the user to click on it
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - the message to print

      • printMessage

        void printMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Prints the message with a button "ok" and waits for the user to click on it
        Parameters:
        message - the message to print

      • translate

        java.lang.String translate(Messages message)
        Translate a message to a corresponding String in the window's current language
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        Returns:
        string representing the message in the correct language
